pocket.text: What a cozy place to be! A fine place for a rat
pocket.alt: A black rat sits in a pocket

cupboard.text: I have never been, but I hear you can find the nicest treats in cupboards

adventure.text: Rats are particularly good at adventures!
adventure.alt: A rat is sitting on a curtain wire

science.alt: A rat sits on a shoulder, under a pile of the human's hair, eating food

seeds.alt: A black rat pulls some seeds off of a toy

human.text: Yes, this is the ideal food for a rat
human.alt: A baby rat is sat next to a jar of peanut butter

chomp.text: So many things to chomp, so little time
chomp.alt: A rat licks a human's finger

squish.text: How can a rat be truly comfortable without another rat underneath?
squish.alt: A rat is fast asleep on top of another rat, who looks squashed

bother.text: Is it bothering if I am being too adorable for you to focus?
bother.alt: A rat pokes his head out of the sleeve of a jumper
